data.title: Gus Aitoro

data.text:
Augustus "Gus" Aitoro was a fictional character on the CBS daytime soap opera Guiding Light.

Actor History:[]

Ricky Paull Goldin (03/2001-04/2008)

Other Information:[]

Presumed deceased January 27, 2006 to March 24, 2006

Crimes Committed:[]

Got into a Chicago rooftop fight with Frederico Santos [1986]

Served time for a murder he didn't commit; took the rap for his sister, Eden August [1986 - 1990's]

Secretly bugged Infierno to keep tabs on Danny Santos [May 1, 2001 - Dec 7, 2001]

Fired a gun into a body, at the docks, and then fired same gun into the Bauer house to incriminate Danny in Carmen Santos’ murder [Jun 5, 2001]

In Germany, threatened to kill Roy Baker by throwing him from a hotel balcony [Mar 10, 2003]

Punched a police officer to keep his cover from being blown [May 5, 2004]

Punched Phillip Spaulding [Oct 7, 2004]

Punched Bill Lewis [Apr 12, 2005]

Stole a drunk prison guard's uniform in order to sneak into prison [May 6, 2005]

Punched A.C. Mallet [May 16, 2005]

Kidnapped Emma Spaulding in an effort to get her mother, Olivia Spencer to return to Springfield [May 20, 2005]

Went on the run with escaped felon, Harley Cooper [May 26, 2005-Jul 15, 2005]

Kidnapped Alan [Dec 29, 2005]

Stole a prescription pad [Apr 21, 2006]

Got into a physical fight with Harley while she was trying to keep him from leaving detox [Apr 26, 2006]

Stole pills out of Rick Bauer’s medical bag [May 17, 2006]

Punched Mallet [May 22, 2006]

Let a drug buyer go free in exchange for the drugs [Jun 2, 2006]

Driving while stoned on pills and alcohol (almost ran down Reva Lewis in the process) [Jun 9, 2006]

Kidnapped Sydney from the police station [Dec 8, 2006]

Repeatedly punched Dylan Lewis [Jul 20, 2007]
